node.title: Canada and the United States are clashing in menâ€™s hockey.
node.alt: Brendan Brisson of the United States and Mat Robinson of Canada in the first period. Both scored goals in the preliminary round game on Saturday.
node.description: The two powerhouses had to cobble together teams after the N.H.L. declined to allow its players to compete.
node.content: ["Canada and the United States had planned to fill their men\u2019s hockey rosters for the Beijing Games with N.H.L. stars. Then the league\u2019s decision in December to withdraw from the Olympics left both teams scrambling for players elsewhere.", "But the stitched-together squads are showing plenty of competitive pluck in their preliminary round game on Saturday in Beijing, were they have traded goals and fearsome hits at National Indoor Stadium."]
